item.monthofswords.wing_sword.tooltip: Light as a feather, and soft as one too, but it's still got some force to it.
advancements.swordsmod.wing_sword.title: Light as a Feather
item.monthofswords.floral_sword.tooltip: A blade from the earth, it's healed by the sun.
item.monthofswords.cursed_sword.tooltip: Deals 5% of your target's health in exchange for 5% of your own.
item.monthofswords.divine_sword.tooltip: Blesses the wielder with a variety of effects when used. Has a 2 minute cooldown.
item.monthofswords.gummy_sword.tooltip: Silly sword snack, yum yum yum.
item.monthofswords.stealth_sword.tooltip: Right-clicking throws down a smoke bomb for quick getaways. Sneak right-clicking foregoes the flashy colors.
Sneak attacks can deal up to 2.5 extra damage. Invisibility, crouching, and attacking from behind are some good ways to catch your opponent off guard.
Right-clicking the sword with a firework rocket in the inventory will consume the rocket and use its design for smoke bombs.
item.monthofswords.moon_sword.tooltip: Deals 1.5 more damage under the moon's light
item.monthofswords.sun_sword.tooltip: Deals 1.5 more damage in the sun's light
item.monthofswords.ocean_sword.tooltip: Deals 1.5 more damage in the water.
item.monthofswords.enchanting_sword.tool: As if powered by an out of control enchanting table, every attack has a new enchantment.
item.monthofswords.dueling_sword.tooltip: Blocks like a shield, parry attacks deal 50% more damage.
item.monthofswords.flame_sword.tooltip: Deals 1 more damage to burning targets. Shoots a fireball on use or a Big fireball with [ %1$s ]
item.monthofswords.ice_sword.tooltip: Deals 1 more damage to frozen targets. Shoots a freezing snowball on use or summons a small blizzard with [ %1$s ]
item.monthofswords.potion_sword.tooltip: Can be filled by using the sword with a potion in your offhand. Attacking gives a lesser effect to the target.
item.monthofswords.bone_sword.tooltip: It's got bones. Bit better than a stone sword.
item.monthofswords.lucky_sword.tooltip: Take a swing, take a roll, who knows what it'll do!
item.monthofswords.mechanical_sword.tool: Someone ping me when create fabric 1.21 :p
item.monthofswords.woven_sword.tooltip: Dashes on use. Dash attacks do 4 extra damage.
item.monthofswords.shock_sword.tooltip: Does 2 extra damage in thunderstorms. Right click summons a lightning bolt.
item.monthofswords.infestation_sword.too: Arthropods will fight for you. Holding right click summons silverfish.
item.monthofswords.glow_sword.tooltip: Does 2 more damage to glowing targets. Right click highlights nearby mobs. [ %1$s ] highlights and does 5 damage to mobs in a wider range.
death.attack.swordtembercurse: %1$s let the curse take too much
effect.monthofswords.smoke_bombed.desc: Prevents affected mobs from finding new attack targets.
effect.monthofswords.necromancer.desc: The undead will not harm a necromancer.
